title: Weight and Height LSRL
question_text: A researcher wanted to investigate the potential relationship between subjects’ weight and height. After measuring $15\text{ individuals}$ , the researcher found heights average $68\text{ inches}$ with a standard deviation of $3.4\text{ inches}$ . Weights averaged $204\text{ pounds}$ with a standard deviation of $24.5\text{ pounds}$ . The correlation coefficient was $r = 0.76$ . What is the equation of the least squares regression line?
